verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> for the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> thing to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O most High: <S%H5945><s%>
To show <S%H5046>forth<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> every <S%H3915>night,<s%>
Upon <S%H5921><s%> an instrument of ten <S%H6218>strings,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5035>psaltery;<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> a solemn <S%H1902>sound.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hast made me <S%H8055>glad<s%> through thy <S%H6467>work:<s%> I will <S%H7442>triumph<s%> in the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works!<s%> and thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6009>deep.<s%>

When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6524>spring<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> the <S%H6212>grass,<s%> and when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> do <S%H6692>flourish;<s%> it is that they shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H5703>forever:<s%> <S%H5704><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>for,<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H6>perish;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> shall be <S%H6504>scattered.<s%>
But my <S%H7161>horn<s%> shalt thou <S%H7311>exalt<s%> like the horn of a <S%H7214>unicorn:<s%> I shall be <S%H1101>anointed<s%> with <S%H7488>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> also shall <S%H5027>see<s%> my desire on mine <S%H7790>enemies,<s%> and mine <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my desire of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%> that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the palm <S%H8558>tree:<s%> he shall <S%H7685>grow<s%> like a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
Those that be <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
They shall <S%H5750>still<s%> bring forth <S%H5107>fruit<s%> in old <S%H7872>age;<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1879>fat<s%> and <S%H7488>flourishing;<s%>
To <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H3477>upright:<s%> he is my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in him.
